storyInfo: Taking advantage of Rhodes Island's course toward the Grand Knight Territory, Catapult decides to take some time off to pay her hometown a visit. She wants to know how her hometown is doing, only to find herself disappointed in the end.

attributes.content: Kazimierz Outskirts
Catapult's Hometown
This is the place, right?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Personnel

attributes.content: Right, this is it.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: I scattered gold coins all over this street, you know?
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Come on, enough of that. This street looks no different than all the other ones.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Personnel

attributes.content: I'm telling the truth.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: The truth? You?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Personnel

attributes.content: Hahahaha.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Personnel

attributes.content: Oh, come on. I'm being serious.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: For real?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Personnel

attributes.content: For real.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Alright, alright, I'll believe you, just this once.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Personnel

attributes.content: When are you heading back to Rhodes Island?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Personnel

attributes.content: Tonight.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: You sure that's enough time?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Personnel

attributes.content: I'm just here to take a look around. Half a day's plenty of time.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Mm-hm.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Personnel

attributes.content: It's 7 A.M. right now.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Personnel

attributes.content: I'll be waiting for you around... 7 P.M. here tonight.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Personnel

attributes.content: Sounds good.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: I'll bring you lots of souvenirs.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: You better make sure you don't get caught first.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Personnel

attributes.content: Keep your terminal on you and keep the channel clear. If anything comes up, let me know right away.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Personnel

attributes.content: Oh, stop treating me like a kid. Off you go.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: And here I'm trying to be nice. Fine.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Personnel

attributes.content: I'm not giving you a ride back if I don't see any souvenirs.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Personnel

attributes.content: No problem, I'll make sure you get to try the dates!
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Phew...
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Alright, let's see how this hellhole's changed.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: The edge of town looks pretty much the same, but the town center...
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Oh, looks like they spent a lot of money here.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: I bet that old fart wouldn't have spent even half a coin on this place.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Looks like the li'l knight who's running the joint might just be a decent fella.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: The young master's alright. We've been living a much more comfortable life than before.
Hey, long time no see. Looks like you've been holding up pretty well the last couple years, Filon.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: You got that letter, and you still came back, huh?
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: Look at you. You look like you're doing pretty well yourself, Arleta.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: What's the deal? You never called me by my real name before.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Did you forget my nickname? Or are you looking down on me? Hm?
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Yeah, yeah, yeah.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: Catapult.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: Happy?
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: Now that's more like it.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: You haven't changed a whole lot since the last time I saw you.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: What have you been up to out there?
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: After I got out, I found myself a gruntwork gig. It pays pretty well, though, and I get to travel everywhere.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: What about you? How's everything been after that whole thing?
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: *Sigh*...
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: You wouldn't know, but not long after you left, the old bastard had the whole town searched. He didn't manage to get even a fourth of his treasures back, though.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: He was so pissed that he jacked up the tax rate.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: Oh, uhh...
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: So, what about now? That's still going on?
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Nope. It lasted maybe two or three months.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: I'm not entirely sure what happened after that, but an investigation team from the big city paid us a visit.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: I don't really know what they talked about, but we never saw the old fart again. Word is he retired and went back home to rest.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: Then the young master came. First, he changed the tax rate back. Then he spent a huge amount of money on the town. That's why the place looks the way it does now.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: Mm-hmm, sounds like he's got a bright future as a leader.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Right, you've been away for so long, I bet you hardly recognize the town. Let me show you around.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: C'mon.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: Hey, ehhh, wait!
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: What's wrong?
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: I'm still wanted. I probably shouldn't just walk on in there.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Come on, didn't I tell you in the letter? The young master canceled all the arrest warrants that had to do with the incident.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: For real?
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: What, you don't trust your old buddy Filon?
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: Of course I do! How could I not?
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Now hurry and lead the way! I can tell from here the whole town's a maze now. I can't imagine making my way around alone.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Right, how long are you staying?
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: My company's landship happens to be sailing through the area, so I took a little time off. I'll be gone by the end of the day.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Well, look at you. Keeping yourself busy even on vacation.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: Come on, I actually came back to check the place out after I read your letter. Sheesh.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Now hurry. Show me around.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Alright, alright. Let's go.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: Here, does this place look familiar? This is the factory I used to work at. It's been fully renovated.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: They even have air conditioning now. It's much more comfortable inside now.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: Hm...
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Filon, I got a question.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Sup?
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: They used to grow food in that patch of land all the way out of town, didn't they?
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: That's right.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: How come it's all grapes now?
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: It's not just that one spot. The young master's planning to turn all the farmland here into a huge vineyard.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: We have good soil here, and we can grow some top quality grapes. They make pretty good money.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: But what about food?
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: You don't eat grapes for all three meals, right?
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Hah, of course not.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: With the grapes, we have the money to buy food from other places.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: It's all imported?
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: That's right.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: You really got to hand it to those big shots from the cities. Thanks to them, our markets are lined with stuff that we never got to eat back in the day.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: Oh yeah? Sounds nice.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: (Sounds like the young master's much more reliable than the old fart.)
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: (But if they don't grow any food here, what will they do if the big shots in the cities raise their prices?)
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: There used to be factories all around town. The young master's planning to merge their operations, and once the big factory's open, we'll all be raking in big bucks with him.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: (Oh well, sounds like I'd be raining on his parade. I'll just keep it to myself.)
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Speaking of, how about I show you the factory?
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: Sure. The last time I was here, they didn't even have a single brick laid yet.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Wow, it's huge. I bet not even the old man's mansion back home is this big.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Damn right.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: And it isn't even done yet. We're working on one side of the factory, while the other side's still being built.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: Once the factory's completed, I reckon the whole town will work here.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: The whole town...? No way.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: 'If you want work, then it's work you'll get.'
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: That's what the young master said.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: You remember the old man who used to feed us radishes?
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: The bald grandpa?
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Yep.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: He had a huge family, so he didn't have to work the fields himself. He had lots of free time.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: Now, the young master gave him a job as a security guard.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: He's got something to do, and he can help out with his family's expenses. You should've seen how happy he was.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: That sounds pretty nice.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: (But... looking around... this doesn't seem like a place you could work with an easy mind...)
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Has the young master thought about cleaning up the area around the factory, though?
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: On our way here, the entire place smelled like acid.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: He told us to bear with it, and that he'll take care of it once the factory's done.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: He's the old jerk's son, though. Do you really believe every word he says?
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Well, we've all had it pretty nice the last couple years, thanks to him.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: Yeah, looks like you've had it better than anyone.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Haha, that's right. Much better than before.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: Maybe he'll put you up for sale, and you'll even help him count his money.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Heh, I wouldn't go that far.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: Then why don't you tell me what you actually got from that young master of yours?
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Well, it's a long story. Why don't we find a restaurant somewhere and we'll talk there?
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: A restaurant? We've got fancy stuff like that here?
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Yeah, and it's cheap, filling, and delicious.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: Sounds like a plan. Lead the way. I'm starting to get hungry.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: *Burp*.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: How's that? Tastes great, doesn't it?
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: Uhh, yeah.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: (Here I thought it was going to be some five star restaurant.)
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: (This is just a fast food restaurant and a pub!)
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: (But this is much better than the scraps the old man used to give us. We sometimes had to skip meals, too.)
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: (I guess fast food... is kind of a luxury in a way.)
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: (The servings are big, it's filling, and it doesn't cost that much.)
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: (But everything outside... has changed so much.)
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: That young master isn't trying to tear down the entire town, right?
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Oh, yeah, that's pretty much what he's done.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: Take a guess. What do you think this fast food joint used to be?
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: Hmmm...
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: The fountain square?
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Nope.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: The square is still there, at least, right?
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: It's gone.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: Damn, that's my only landmark.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Let's see...
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: The courthouse?
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Getting warmer.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: That's still not it?
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Hm...
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: You don't mean—
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: (Imitates an explosion)
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: That?
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Bingo.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: Well, the young master is really trying to erase all traces of the old man.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: He even rebuilt this place.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: So where's the young master? Where does he live?
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Right there. On the top.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: You'll know what I mean once you step outside and take a look. There isn't another building here that tall.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: All the rich and famous people in town live there.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: I thought you raked in a lot of money. How come you didn't move in?
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Heh, I still have a ways to go compared to those who really made it big.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: I have a bit of savings, much thanks to you.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: And I hid it pretty well when the old bastard was still running things.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: But as soon as the young master came along, I thought I'd use the money to start a business.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: Nice. You've always had pretty good luck ever since we were kids, and you're smart. You probably raked in tons of money, didn't you?
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Ehh? Nope... It's not that easy...
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: The young master had a huge area plotted out when he started working on his factory, so I figured I would open a small shop right next to it.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: But as soon as I signed my lease, he decided to start building his factory from the other end.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: Since I'd paid up already, I had no choice but to open the shop.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: Only the few families in the neighborhood come visit.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: I've been in the red all these years, even now.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: And I have no idea when they'll start building the factory on my side either...
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: But you've been tooting his horn all day long.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: You don't get it.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: We've had knight competitions here ever since that knightess lass paid the old man a visit.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: But it only got this popular thanks to the young master.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: Now, not only do we get some decent games to watch...
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: (Whisper) We get to earn some cash too.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: You watch the games... and you make money from that? That sounds too good to be true.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: I'm not kidding.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: (Checks wristwatch)
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: Perfect. This afternoon's games are about to begin.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: I'll pay for your ticket. Come on.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: (Sounds good up front.)
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: (But how come it feels like something's not quite right?)
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Should be this row.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: (Sits down)
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: This is a sofa?! Whoa, it's so comfy!
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: This young master really spares no expense huh.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: This indoor arena's even bigger than that tower he lives in.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: It's our town's landmark, at least until the factory's all built.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: It's big, it's got style, and it's comfortable.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: We get to enjoy all this, so of course we've got a few nice things to say about him.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: Heh, sounds right.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: How come there's a terminal on the seat?
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Oh, that?
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: Listen up, Catapult. This is how I make money.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: What do you mean?
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Welcome one, welcome all to the arena! I am your commentator for today's game.
attributes.name: Commentator

attributes.content: First off, let us welcome the rising star of our town, the independent knight Raz!
attributes.name: Commentator

attributes.content: Raz?!
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Didn't he used to be a cop for the old fart?
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: What's going on here?!
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: A lot of people lost their jobs that day, thanks to you. Raz's one of them.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: At first, he said he was going back home to work the fields, but ever since he met that high-class knightess, suddenly all he'd say is 'I'm going to become a professional knight' and stuff.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: I thought it was just talk.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: But he was serious.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: And he was one of the first to sign up when they started running competitions here.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: The guy always had decent looks, and he's not half bad too. He's pretty popular all over town.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: And of course, the most important thing is that...
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: He wins.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: I'm not so sure about today's match, though...
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: And his opponent—former Glorious Shield equipment tester and independent knight—Mr. Stone!
attributes.name: Commentator

attributes.content: Equipment tester...?
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Hey, hey. This guy's definitely no pushover!
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Yeah, I know. Calm down.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: Your terminals are now active.
attributes.name: Commentator

attributes.content: Care for a little wager? Or maybe buy some chips to drop in supplies to help them out?
attributes.name: Commentator

attributes.content: The fate of the knights lies in their hands—and yours!
attributes.name: Commentator

attributes.content: The terminal's on...
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: (Taps the terminal for a while)
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: What are you doing?
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Quiet. Give me a minute.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: The odds are stacked against Raz... but...
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: The payout, though...
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: Alright, I'm betting on Raz!
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: (Taps the terminal for a while)
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: You bet... 5000?
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: That's... not a currency, right?
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: It is. It's just a number right now, but whatever you punch in during the competitions, you'll have to pay if you owe anything after the match.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: There's bound to be people who can't pay it back, right?
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: If you can't pay... you make it up to the young master by working for him.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: Do you know what you're doing?!
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: I'm betting on Raz!
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: As long as he wins, I'll be swimming in cash! Get it?!
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: I did my research. Raz's numbers don't look good, but he will win.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: I'm sure he'll win!
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: But what if he loses?!
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Right, I sometimes slip up.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: But as long as I bet on Raz, he's going to win!
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: Just trust him, and trust me, okay?!
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: Let the games begin!
attributes.name: Commentator

attributes.content: (Ignores Catapult and stares intently at the competition.)
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: (Filon...)
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: (Raz can't match that Stone in skills or equipment. Don't you know that?)
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: (He may be talented, but that's a country guard fighting a veteran mercenary!)
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: (I know you're lucky, but this...)
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: That's it, Raz! Good one!
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: (He's giving it all he's got right up front. If Dobermann was here training him, he'd be getting the whip.)
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: I'm telling you, Raz's going to win.
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: (Enters 1000 on the terminal's keypad)
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: That's what I'm talking about, Raz! Beat the living hell out of him!
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: (How long will he last?)
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: 15 minutes later...
What's wrong, Raz? You can take that hick!
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: H-Hang in there! I'll send you some supplies!
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: (Taps the terminal for a while)
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: (His opponent is starting to fight back...)
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: (Hold on?!)
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: That outsider hick's not holding back at all!
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: I-It's a no-limits match...
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: Ugh.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: My money... M-My money...
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: (Switches on the comms)
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: (Whispers) Hey, can you hear me?
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Loud and clear. What's the matter?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Personnel

attributes.content: Are you getting arrested?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Personnel

attributes.content: (Whispers) Something like that. Get ready, and drive to the arena in the town center.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: (Whispers) Think you'll be able to get us out alive?
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Understood, and worry about yourself first.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Personnel

attributes.content: Keep the channel open.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Personnel

attributes.content: (Whispers) Thanks.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: (Reloads ammo)
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: (Pressurizes weapon)
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Raz! Raz, you can't lose!
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: I don't care if you die, but what about my money?!
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: Out of the way!
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: (It won't be easy to land this hit without collateral damage from this distance...)
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: (Aims)
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: (Argh, whatever! I'm going for it!)
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: (Raz, you're a good guy. You shouldn't die here.)
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: (After this, we'll be even, and there'll be nothing left for me here.)
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: (Alright, you big dummy, come closer!)
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: (Pulls the trigger)
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: (Concentrates)
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: What a beautiful shot!!!!
attributes.name: Commentator

attributes.content: Just as victory was within reach, Mr. Stone suddenly turned toward the audience.
attributes.name: Commentator

attributes.content: And our little fella took his chance!
attributes.name: Commentator

attributes.content: He raised his sword and struck his opponent down in one hit!
attributes.name: Commentator

attributes.content: A textbook comeback!
attributes.name: Commentator

attributes.content: Victory goes to the independent knight—Raz!
attributes.name: Commentator

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: H-He won?!
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: He won! He won!! I won!!
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: What did I tell you, huh, Catapult?
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: Whenever I put money on Raz, he wins! Every time!
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: Hahahahahaha!!!!
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: (Lowers weapon)
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Catapult. Catapult?
attributes.name: Filon

attributes.content: Hey.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: I'm here. Look to your right.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Personnel

attributes.content: Coming.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Looks like shit didn't hit the fan.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Personnel

attributes.content: Guess nothing good came of your visit, then.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Personnel

attributes.content: Is it like this everywhere in Kazimierz?
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: The competition knights and the arenas?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Personnel

attributes.content: Yeah, it is.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Personnel

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: What time is it?
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Around 5 or 6 P.M.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Personnel

attributes.content: Let's find some dinner, get some souvenirs, and head on back.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: And get as far away from this stinking place as we can.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Skurwysyny.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Hmph...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Personnel

attributes.content: Well, get in the car.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Personnel

attributes.content: There's a guy running toward us with a big bag of cash. Is that a friend of yours?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Personnel

attributes.content: An acquaintance, that's all.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Now floor it.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Not necessary. His bag's got a hole.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Personnel

attributes.content: Did he turn back to pick up his money?
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: (Turns steering wheel)
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Personnel

attributes.content: Looks like he went back. You still want a look?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Personnel

attributes.content: Nah, why would I?
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Ahhh—I'm starving.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Let's get some grub, brother.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Can't you see I'm driving?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Personnel

attributes.content: But don't you worry, Catapult. I looked a place up.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Personnel

attributes.content: We're almost to the restaurant.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Personnel
